query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN semana IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as com_semana,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN numeroAula IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as com_numero,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN linkLibras IS NOT NULL AND linkLibras != '' THEN 1 END) as com_libras,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN linkAudiodescricao IS NOT NULL AND linkAudiodescricao != '' THEN 1 END) as com_audio,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN ccLegenda = true THEN 1 END) as com_cc
FROM videoaulas
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4Q6CVQSvv4vsSx3.a0e54a3010e2 --database AgAQ7M7gXFHDiuyXgHyZLe --execute SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN semana IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as com_semana,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN numeroAula IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as com_numero,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN linkLibras IS NOT NULL AND linkLibras != '' THEN 1 END) as com_libras,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN linkAudiodescricao IS NOT NULL AND linkAudiodescricao != '' THEN 1 END) as com_audio,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN ccLegenda = true THEN 1 END) as com_cc
FROM videoaulas
